name: React Component Development
description: Build reusable React components with props and state.

description: Implement Redux for global state management in a React app.

name: React Router and Navigation
description: Create a multi-page React application using React Router.

name: Angular Directives and Components
description: Build custom Angular components and directives.

name: Angular Forms and Validation
description: Implement reactive and template-driven forms with validation.

name: Angular Routing and Lazy Loading
description: Implement routing and lazy loading in an Angular project.

name: SQL Queries and Database Normalization
description: Write SQL queries and normalize a relational database schema.

name: Indexing and Query Optimization
description: Optimize SQL queries using indexing techniques.

name: NoSQL Database Implementation
description: Design and implement a NoSQL database schema.

name: Machine Learning Model Training
description: Train a regression model using a real-world dataset.

name: Neural Networks for Classification
description: Implement and train a neural network for image classification.

name: Unsupervised Learning with Clustering
description: Apply K-Means and hierarchical clustering to a dataset.

name: Microcontroller Programming
description: Write and deploy a program for an Arduino microcontroller.

name: Embedded System Design
description: Develop an embedded system for sensor data collection.

name: IoT-Based Embedded System
description: Connect an embedded system to an IoT cloud platform.

name: Deploying a Web App on AWS
description: Host a full-stack web application on AWS EC2 and S3.

name: Serverless Computing with AWS Lambda
description: Create a serverless application using AWS Lambda and API Gateway.

name: Cloud Security & IAM Management
description: Configure IAM roles and permissions for secure cloud applications.

name: Kafka Producer-Consumer System
description: Develop a Kafka producer-consumer system to handle message streaming.

name: Real-Time Data Processing with Kafka Streams
description: Use Kafka Streams API to process real-time data streams.

name: Kafka Integration with Spark
description: Integrate Kafka with Apache Spark for big data streaming.

name: Python Basics and Data Structures
description: Write Python scripts to demonstrate the use of variables, loops, and data structures (lists, tuples, dictionaries).

name: Object-Oriented Programming in Python
description: Implement a Python program using classes, objects, inheritance, and polymorphism.

name: File Handling and Exception Handling
description: Develop a Python application that reads and writes files while implementing proper exception handling.
